post.body: I really don't mind letting other people do it, just don't have the funds.
Niiice. LOL!
Yeah, the first time I did. ;)
I can't even fathom cutting my whole head...eeek
Aww, poor baby! Thank goodness hair grows quickly, right?
I've learned the hard way how to do that...
@CathyNagle @Zoeyjane @LynnMaudlin @VoxAZ @zaibatsu @rdeal1 The proof is in the pudding: http://www.twitpic.com/sq5f
Nah, I tried that the first time I gave myself bangs and learned my lesson. ;P
I don't know- but I can if you want me to. ;)
Awww thanks! You're sweet.
And I thought I was the only conservative who thought such blasphemy. I've never quite been able to draw inside the lines...
LOL! Do ya want me to nominate you for an #egomaniac award?
I have to agree on the sex ed issue- and I think #TCOT should allow for differences in opinions on this, you know?
Amen!
Whoa, whoa-the #egocentric award is all MINE. Seriously, tho, you deserve to win a Shorty-your TwitterStream never disappoints.:)
Hey now, in my world, that isn't a bad thing. (I guess I need to be nominated for a #douche award, too.) :D
:P Sorry, I couldn't resist.
I confess- I am a *little* green around the gills...
Ho ho ho Somebody's got jokes. ;)
I got sick and then my internet got jacked up. Sorry. :)
Air, eh? New York is full of LooneyTunes, I guess.
I really *did* miss some good stuff. Off to go check out http://tinyurl.com/44pdb6
So what's new over there? Any juicy political gossip I'm missing out on?
I feel a little better now...but I'm still jealous. ;)
:) Glad to be back. Are you feeling better today?
Oooh. I'm so jealous. I *dream* of such results.
Probably. I'm just guessing, but I'd have to say that that might help a little. ;)
Thanks! I thought I really ought to get in the Christmas spirit, so voila', one sickly green av coming right up. :P
Ideally, I'd like for my passion to become my work, so ditto on earning about $1000/month. I haven't made a cent yet, though.
Yaaay! I missed you too, buddy. :)
I would love to know if anyone has actually used their Twittering/blogging activities to support their families as well...
Oh no! Tis the season (to feel icky). Feel better soon...
I DM'd you your original tweet reply so you can see what I was talking about. :)
@VoxAZ It's really frustrating- that and the fact that only about half my @replies actually show up in my replies tab. :(
I'm so totally a closet drunken Twitterer (using my 'I-like-to-Twitter-nekkid' account).
Drunk Twittering can be a dangerous trend, though- be careful. :)
Nooo...don't go! It took me a while to get a hang of this Twitter thing, but it's so much fun once you get rolling.
I'm sure you'll rise to the challenge. :)
LOL! Well I'll have to keep an eye on your work to see if you make the cut. :P
Hey! I'm kinda flaky, but I'm here off and on. :) Missed ya too!
It's your totally sex-ified avatar- if you want them to all go away, put something fugly up there. :P
Sheesh. 3000?! You are one popular girl.
LOL! I've been traveling to the relatives and whatnot so I haven't got a chance to twitter much. :)
Wow. Your fire dept. must be staffed entirely by complete tools. Sorry to hear that.
Sorry. ;)
Nope. I think it still stands, as long as *you* were standing.
Sophisticated, me thinks.
Just cut my own bangs. Yeah, I know I'm crazy.
http://tinyurl.com/6966pr "The more we depend on government, the less connection we have with one another" Brilliant.
Does is there a #villageidiot @shortyawards category? I think that's right up my alley...
to Twitter again tomorrow. Toodle-Loo!
Well, my tweeps, I have to call it a day. It's been a bad week here, with the kidlet teething and whatnot, but I'm going to attempt
Finally got my internet working again- it was in and out all day yesterday. Grrr.
Shimmer Me Timbers! Holiday Makeup Secrets for a Hot Mama http://tinyurl.com/9hmw4c
Off to bed, my lovely tweeps! G'nite. :)
http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/americas/7798127.stm #Blago is still innocent, Obama is still 'squeaky' clean. What else is new?!
One 'Christmas' down, two to go. Whew. I'm already exhausted and it's not even the real Christmas yet.
Sorry for running off on ya last night tweeps- the kidlet was crying for his 'mom-mom' so I had to split.
Okay, okay, I'm leaving. G'nite Twitterland!
Darn. It's midnight already, and I have to get up before the sun gets up. Sorry, tweeps, but it's off to bed for me. : ' (
